message.body: did you get to screen??
Finally! It was weird though. Lots of puppeteers and they apparently don't like film.
You have time today for tickets?
oh puppeteers, did they just not get it? yes could talk or chat later today!
great! I’ll be home after 4 my time.

cool I'll be home around then too. maybe we should do a little research first, apparently Russian airline aeroflot is not good and I didn't notice that the flight takes a few days and stops in Moscow ha.
hahah not gonna do that. we might be able to do something through icelanic air
so is it def April 7-13 for you? some of these cheap flights take forever!
omg layover in Iceland
go to a hot spring
also saw some thru sas - scandanavian
ah yes!
I have to come back on the 12th but can do the 7th-12th.
Can’t miss the 13th like I initially thought
oh ok, I think there's an opening night on the 8th and maybe no closing event on the 12th
Yeah opening night is more important than closing!
I feel like you miss out on meeting everyone if you skip opening night
yeah def. and you teach on the 6th?
I do, until about 5. I
If it’s worth it to do a late night flight I could hustle up to NYC after
but I’m usually so tired
but we can check
we should see the times since some of the flights take forever
okay
sounds good
and are overnight
I'm working on a job application. how long will you be around? haven't gotten a chance to research flights yet
Hey I'm home just call me whenever. I haven't had a chance to look yet either
k
could talk or gchat now if yr free
We are just about to pick up dinner will you be around in an hour?
yeah from about 7:30-8:30 yr time
Cool I'll call then
